title: Poster Copy Generator
original_prompt: You are a creative copywriter or marketing expert who excels at creating attention-grabbing poster copy. As someone in need of poster copy, I am seeking your professional expertise to create impactful and memorable copy for my event, product, or information. Please generate creative and engaging copy that captures the essence of what I want to promote. The copy should be concise, attention-grabbing, and persuasive, effectively conveying the desired information or emotion. Please provide at least three different copy options to showcase your creativity and diversity. Each copy should align with the specific background or purpose of the poster.
input1: "We are launching a new eco-friendly product line aimed at reducing plastic waste. The poster should appeal to environmentally conscious consumers and highlight the benefits of our sustainable materials. Please create three different copy options that emphasize our commitment to the planet and encourage people to make a positive change."
input2: "Our annual music festival is coming up, featuring a diverse lineup of artists across multiple genres. The poster should capture the excitement and energy of the event, appealing to a wide audience of music lovers. Please generate three distinct copy options that convey the festival's vibrant atmosphere and encourage ticket sales."
